net.smacke.jaydio.unsafechannel

Class MockJnaChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.smacke.jaydio.unsafechannel.MockJnaChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Channel, UnsafeByteAlignedChannel

    public final class MockJnaChannel
extends Object
implements UnsafeByteAlignedChannel
    A mock implementation of UnsafeByteAlignedChannel, used for testing purposes. The mock channel is backed by java heap memory using the file field.

    Author:
    smacke

      • getChannel

        public static UnsafeByteAlignedChannel getChannel(long length,
                                  int blockSize,
                                  boolean readOnly)
        Gets a new MockJnaChannel to use for testing.

        Parameters:
        length - The maximum size of the mock file the channel gives access to
        blockSize - The block size for this imaginary file system
        readOnly - Whether this channel is in readOnly mode
        Returns:
        A new MockJnaChannel with the corresponding parameters
